subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: An injury kept Sime out of the 1956 Olympics and bad luck cost him a gold medal in 1960; he became an ophthalmologist whose patients included Richard Nixon and Ted Williams.
snippet: An injury kept Sime out of the 1956 Olympics and bad luck cost him a gold medal in 1960; he became an ophthalmologist whose patients included Richard Nixon and Ted Williams.
